about_the_game:
Estate Escape VR

You arrived to this town a few months ago, to work as a servant for one of the elite of the area.
The pay was handsome, but you could tell something was wrong from the first day....
The owners of the house you worked in, are abusive to the people around them and have trapped you in their home, you want to leave this place, but you need money.
It is the time of year when all the rich people gather for the annual festival and the house will finally be empty for long enough.
Can you break out of your room and find enough gold to get you home?

This DLC is for players who want to play on VR and/or Desktop.
